title: Locked Out Of Heaven
lyrics:
[intro]
(C-Dm) (C-Bb)Oh yeah, yeah, (F-Gm)oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Gm) (Gm)
(C-Dm) (C-Bb)Oh yeah, yeah, (F-Gm)oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Gm) (Gm)
 
(C-Dm) Never had much (Bb)faith in love or (Gm)miracles
(Dm) Never would have (Bb)put my heart on the (Gm)line
(Dm) I’m swimming in your (Bb)world of something (Gm)spiritual
(Dm) I’m born again every(Bb)time you spend the (Gm)ni-i-ight (Gm)
             
Cause your (Dm)xxx takes me to (Bb)paradise                    
Yeah, your (Gm)xxx takes me to (Gm)paradise
And it (F)sho-o-ows (A)yeah-ah-ah
 
[chorus]
Cause you make me (Bb)feel like
I’ve been locked out of (Gm)heaven
For too (F)long… for too (C)long
Cause you make me (Bb)feel like
I’ve been locked out of (Gm)heaven
For too (F)long… for too (C)long
 
(C-Dm) (C-Bb)Oh yeah, yeah, (F-Gm)oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Gm) (Gm)
(C-Dm) (C-Bb)Oh yeah, yeah, (F-Gm)oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Gm) (Gm)
 
(C-Dm) You bring me to my (Bb)knees, you make me (Gm)testify
(Dm) You could make a (Bb)sinner change his (Gm)ways
Open (Dm)up your gates, cause (Bb)I can’t wait to (Gm)see your light
(Dm) And right there is (Bb)where I want to (Gm)stay-ay-ay (Gm)
 
Cause your (Dm)xxx takes me to (Bb)paradise                    
Yeah, your (Gm)xxx takes me to (Gm)paradise
And it (F)sho-o-ows (A)yeah-ah-ah
 
[chorus]
Cause you make me (Bb)feel like
I’ve been locked out of (Gm)heaven
For too (F)long… for too (C)long
Cause you make me (Bb)feel like
I’ve been locked out of (Gm)heaven
For too (F)long… for too (C)long
 
[bridge]
(Bb)Oh, woah, woah, woah, (Gm)yeah, yeah, yeah
You might just (F)stay here?
Spend the rest of my (C)days here?
(Bb)Oh, woah, woah, woah, (Gm)yeah, yeah, yeah
You might just (F)stay here?
Spend the rest of my (C)days here?
 
[chorus]
Cause you make me (Bb)feel like
I’ve been locked out of (Gm)heaven
For too (F)long… for too (C)long
Cause you make me (Bb)feel like
I’ve been locked out of (Gm)heaven
For too (F)long… for too (C)long
 
[outro]
(C-Dm) (C-Bb)Oh yeah, yeah, (F-Gm)oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Gm) (Gm)
(C-Dm) (C-Bb)Oh yeah, yeah, (F-Gm)oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah (Gm) (Gm)
(C-Dm) [end]
